ygData.subject: OFF TOPIC - email problems??
ygData.msgSnippet: For those of you who receive this via email AND for whomever manages - troubleshoots this list: Does anyone else receive responses to posts before they get the
ygData.messageBody:
For those of you who receive this via email AND for whomever manages - troubleshoots this list:

Does anyone else receive responses to posts before they get the actual original post??? This happens to me all the time, and sometimes it's days before I get the original post and can figure out what is being discussed...

Also, I've noticed that some posts of mine come back throught right away, while others I have posted take days...

Is there a technical problem someone can look into???

==Lady Brangwen Incantare of the 21st Song
===The Lavender-Eyed Lady of Song
====Squire Court of The Guild New Outriders
=====Citizen of the City of Kelethin on Faydwer
======Wife of High Elf Enchanter, Callais Incantare
=======Server: The Rathe
============================================
